item.description:
Meet and Greet with
Amy Citarell of Harvest Moo

Amy is a talented artist who in a whimsical and bright way can capture your pet?s most intimate or crazy moments with oil on canvas. Each painting is an original that you will have for your entire life.

Please join us on Thursday, March 20, 2008 from 6pm-8pm at the DoggieDay play center located at 400 Tremont St, Boston, MA for a meet and greet with this aspiring artist. You can also bring a favorite photo with you to have Amy convert into a timeless art piece.

More information about Amy Citarell and Harvest Moo can be found online at www.harvestmoo.com

If you are unable to meet Amy this Thursday, samples of her work can be viewed at the DoggieDay Play Center.

We look forward to seeing you there!
item.name: Meet and Greet with Amy Citarell
